posts.post_content:
[IMG]http://www.blacksoxfan.com/images/cards/t206_polarbear.jpg[/IMG]

***Updated***
Currently Looking for Polar Bear Portraits only. SGC preferred but will look at PSA. I made a list of the cards I need so if you have any please contact me. I think that is all of the portraits with polar bear backs. I am looking for 3-5 range on grades. Could be lower grades if its nice eye appeal. If you have any please contact me. 

Thanks for looking
Jesse

WHAT CARDS I NEED
Fred Abbott
